nodeList.loreText: Gone from reality in the blink of an eye and the fall of a blade
nodeList.nodeDescription: A melee attack that hits all enemies in a large area in front of you. Enemies killed by the hit are erased from existance, replaced by void rifts.

nodeList.altText: {Void Rift} is a spell which deals void damage in an area.
nodeList.description: {Void Rifts} created by Erasing Strike hit enemies in a larger area.
nodeList.nodeDescription: The void rifts created when you erase an enemy have [35%] increased area of effect per point

node.loreText: Gone from reality in the blink of an eye and the fall of a blade
node.nodeDescription: A melee attack that hits all enemies in a large area in front of you. Enemies killed by the hit are erased from existance, replaced by void rifts.

nodeList.altText: {Void Rift} is a spell which deals void damage in an area.
nodeList.description: {Void Rift} hits have a chance to inflict enemies with {Time Rot}, a debuff that reduces attack and cast speed by 15%, increases stun duration by 25%, and deals void damage over time.
nodeList.nodeDescription: The void rifts created when you erase an enemy have [25%] chance to apply time rot per point.\n\nTime rot reduces attack and cast speed by 15%, increases stun duration by 25%, and deals void damage over time.

node.altText: {Void Rift} is a spell which deals void damage in an area.
node.description: {Void Rifts} created by Erasing Strike hit enemies in a larger area.

nodeList.altText: {Void Rift} is a spell which deals void damage in an area.
nodeList.description: {Void Rift} hits cause enemies to take increased damage over time for 4 seconds.
nodeList.nodeDescription: Enemies hit by the void rifts created when you erase an enemy take [20%] increased damage over time per point for 4 seconds

nodeList.altText: If you have a similar effect from an item or passive node then the highest threshold is used.
nodeList.description: Erasing Strike hits deal more damage and instantly kill enemies who drop under a health threshold.
nodeList.nodeDescription: Erasing strike's initial hit deals [10%] increased damage per point and instantly kills enemies that drop below a health threshold equal to [2%] of their maximum health per point.

node.description: Erasing Strike costs significantly less mana, but no longer scales with increased attack speed.

node.nodeDescription: Erasing Strike no longer scales with attack speed, but has 50% increased mana efficiency.

node.nodeDescription: A melee attack that hits all enemies in a large area in front of you. Enemies killed by the hit are erased from existance, replaced by void rifts.

nodeList.description: You gain increased movement speed if you have killed an enemy with Erasing Strike recently (last 4 seconds).
nodeList.nodeDescription: You have [8%] increased movement speed if you have erased an enemy in the past 4 seconds.

node.description: Kills with Erasing Strike heal you for a percentage of your maximum health.
node.nodeDescription: When you erase an enemy you are healed for [1%] of their maximum health per point

node.description: Erasing Strike hits deal more damage, but Erasing Strike costs more mana.
node.nodeDescription: [10%] increased mana cost per point. Erasing strike's initial hit deals [20%] increased damage per point.

node.loreText: Gone from reality in the blink of an eye and the fall of a blade
node.nodeDescription: A melee attack that hits all enemies in a large area in front of you. Enemies killed by the hit are erased from existance, replaced by void rifts.

nodeList.description: The kills required to summon {Void Beams} via the {Ravenous Void} node require less kills to trigger, but Erasing Strike costs more mana.
nodeList.nodeDescription: [35%] increased mana cost per point. Ravenous Void requires one less kill to trigger per point.

node.altText: {Void Beams} scale with increased void and spell damage.
node.description: If you kill 5 or more enemies simultaneously with Erasing Strike, you create 4 {Void Beams} which travel at random, damaging surrounding enemies for 3 seconds.
node.nodeDescription: If you erase 5 enemies with one hit of erasing strike you create 4 void beams that travel at random, continuously dealing void damage to nearby enemies.\n\nThe beams scale with increased to void damage and spell damage, but not with other nodes on this tree.

node.description: You gain increased movement speed if you have killed an enemy with Erasing Strike recently (last 4 seconds).
node.nodeDescription: You have [8%] increased movement speed if you have erased an enemy in the past 4 seconds.

node.nodeDescription: When you erase an enemy you are healed for [1%] of their maximum health per point

nodeList.altText: {Void Beam} scales with increased void and spell damage.
nodeList.description:
When Erasing Strike kills an enemy you have a chance to summon a {Void Beam} at their location, a spell that continuously damages surrounding enemies for 3 seconds.

Erasing Strike costs more mana.
nodeList.nodeDescription: [10%] increased mana cost per point. When you erase an enemy you have a [25%] chance per point to create a stationary void beam at its location that lasts for 3 seconds, continuously dealing void damage to surrounding enemies.\n\nThe beam scales with increased to void damage and spell damage, but not with other nodes on this tree.

stats.statName: No Longer Scales With Attack Speed

nodeList.description:
Erasing Strike critical strikes have a chance to grant you a {Void Essence}, which grant 15% increased void damage, 15% increased melee damage, and 10% reduced stun duration. 

You can have a maximum of 3 void essences at once.
nodeList.nodeDescription:
Grants [34#] chance per point to gain a void essence when you deal a critical strike with erasing strike's initial hit.

Void essences last 7 seconds and grant 15% increased void damage, 15% increased melee damage, and 10% reduced duration of stuns on you.

You can have a maximum of 3 void essences at once.
